CHAT.comment: KHANH PHUONG NGUYEN, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES; and TUYET MAI THI PHAN, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY T. GREEN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PATRICIA A. [*23] MILLETT ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY T. GREEN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
